data.text: Nɨ uaghan ghaze, kɨ arazir kuratam damighan koghtɨ,
“Jop, kɨ datɨrɨghɨn nɨ ko nɨn namakabar akaba ikarvaghasa.
Nɨ kogh pɨn deraghvɨra overiamɨn itir ghuariabar gan.
Nɨ arazir kuratam damigh, egh nɨ a gasɨghasighan kogham.
Egh nɨ zurara arazir aghuibar amutɨ,
Arazir kurar nɨ amiba, da gumazamiziba eraram asɨghasɨsi.
God fofozir aghuarim gumazamizibagh anɨngizɨ, me asɨzir atiaba ko kuarazibagh afira,
Guizbangɨra, gumazamiziba akurvazim bagha Godɨn diava arai.
“Jop pura bizibav gei, ezɨ an mɨgɨrɨgɨaba derazir puvatɨ.
